column4: Is there any way to determine whether not having TRIM turned on is the reason a drive is slow?
you would have had to have written the full capacity of the SSD to it to start recycling bad blocks and thus have bad performance
of course, I don't think I've ever filled it completely all at once. But having it be near full, then emptied would have the same problem, right?
are you not running a new enough kernel for TRIM to be on?
